SEARCH
Package boundary

Class OfficerMain

Object
OfficerMain
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserMain<Officer>
public class OfficerMain extends Object implements IUserMain<Officer>
The OfficerMain class provides the main menu and interactions for an HDB officer user. It allows officers to view project details, manage applications and enquiries, register for projects, and view registration statuses.
